Literature.Title: Laterosporulin10: a novel defensin like Class IId bacteriocin from Brevibacillus sp. strain SKDU10 with inhibitory activity against microbial pathogens.
Literature.Author: Baindara P, Singh N, Ranjan M, Nallabelli N, Chaudhry V, Pathania GL, Sharma N, Kumar A, Patil PB, Korpole S

Literature.Title: Anticancer properties of a defensin like class IId bacteriocin Laterosporulin10
Literature.Author: Baindara P, Gautam A, Raghava GPS, Korpole S

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Rabbit erythrocytes:<20% Hemolysis=100 µM,Rabbit erythrocytes:<10% Hemolysis=40 µM,Human epithelial prostate cells RWPE-1:LC50=>20 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC50=0.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus MTCC 1430(MIC50=4µM),Bacillus subtilis MTCC 121(MIC50=6µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa MTCC 1934(no activity data),Vibrio cholerae MTCC 3904(no activity data),Escherichia coli MTCC 1610(MIC=100µM),Mycobacterium smegmatis mc2-155(MIC50=45µM),Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus MTCC 1430(MBC=8µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(no activity data),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(LC50=6µM),Human fibrosarcoma HT1080(LC50=7.5µM),Human lung carcinoma H1299(LC50=7µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(LC50=8µM)
